item.title: 网络攻击让朝日陷入困境，竞争对手酿酒商却后来居上
item.description: 在日本准备迎接最繁忙的啤酒消费季节之际，这家日本最大的啤酒生产商却在为继续供应啤酒而苦苦挣扎；在一次网络攻击破坏其供应链一个多月后，其系统仍处于瘫痪状态。【原文：As Japan gears up for its busiest beer-drinking season, the country’s largest brewer is struggling to stay on tap — with its systems still crippled more than a month after a cyberattack disrupted its supply chain.】

item.title: 温克艾沃斯的双子座加密货币交易所因亏损而下跌
item.description: 由泰勒-温克艾沃斯和卡梅隆-温克艾沃斯创办的加密货币交易所双子座空间站公司（Gemini Space Station Inc.【原文：Gemini Space Station Inc., the crypto exchange founded by Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss, reported a steeper loss than analysts anticipated in its first earnings release since going public.】

item.title: C3.ai 在报道称软件公司正在探索出售后上涨
item.description: 据路透社报道，数据分析软件制造商 C3.ai Inc.【原文：C3.ai Inc., a maker of data-analysis software, gained after Reuters reported the company is exploring a sale.】

item.title: 人工智能公司竞相扩张，CoreWeave 利润率趋紧
item.description: CoreWeave Inc. 公布的第三季度利润率有所收窄，因为这家云计算公司正在努力扩大基础设施，为更多客户提供服务。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. reported narrower profit margins in the third quarter as the cloud computing company races to expand its infrastructure and serve more customers.】

item.title: 业务和抵押贷款增长推动 CBA 盈利增长
item.description: 在企业和家庭贷款增长的支持下，澳大利亚联邦银行第一季度的利润有所增长。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia’s profit rose in the first quarter, supported by growth in lending to businesses and households.】

item.title: 魁北克省长推动 4960 亿加元养老金在国内投资
item.description: 魁北克省省长弗朗索瓦-勒戈尔（Francois Legault）表示，随着加拿大适应美国贸易壁垒的新现实，他希望该省的养老基金能更多地投资于本地，包括在制造业下注。【原文：Quebec Premier Francois Legault said he wants the province’s pension fund to invest more locally, including making bets in the manufacturing sector, as Canada adjusts to a new reality of US trade barriers.】

item.title: 风险最高的 CLO 证券提供五年来最低的回报率
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的数据显示，风险最高的企业贷款支持债券的投资者目前得到的回报率是五年来最低的，有些投资者甚至得不到任何回报。【原文：Investors in the riskiest slice of bonds backed by corporate loans are now getting their lowest payouts in five years, while some get none at all, according to Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.title: 受降息押注影响，新西兰元即将抹去 2025 年涨幅
item.description: 新西兰元即将成为今年首个抹去对美元汇率涨幅的主要发达市场货币，原因是央行激进的降息措施在经济不景气的情况下打压了市场情绪。【原文：New Zealand’s dollar is on the verge of becoming the first major developed-market currency to wipe out its gains against the greenback this year as aggressive central bank interest-rate cuts weigh on sentiment amid a faltering economy.】

item.title: 纳斯达克正在 "增兵 "以应对 ETF 股票类上市潮
item.description: 在美国监管机构表示将允许资产管理公司将 ETF 作为现有共同基金的份额类别发售后，纳斯达克公司正在招聘人员，以在潜在的上市潮中抢占先机。【原文：Nasdaq Inc. is hiring to get ahead of a potential wave of listings after US regulators signaled they’ll allow asset managers to offer ETFs as share classes of existing mutual funds.】

item.title: 年底将至，关门终局重振美国 IPO 前景
item.description: 结束美国政府停摆的协议势头越来越猛，这刺激了人们的希望，更多的首次公开募股最快将在感恩节前出炉。【原文：The increasing momentum behind a deal to end the US government shutdown is spurring hope that more IPOs will trickle out as soon as before Thanksgiving.】

item.title: 美国称布莱恩-卡恩因预言对冲基金倒闭而被起诉
item.description: 根据美国法院的一份文件，Franchise Group Inc. 前负责人布莱恩-卡恩（Brian Kahn）被指控共谋实施证券欺诈，与一家对冲基金的倒闭有关，检察官称该基金的倒闭使投资者损失了 2.94 亿美元。【原文：Brian Kahn, the former head of Franchise Group Inc., has been charged with conspiracy to commit securities fraud related to the collapse of a hedge fund that prosecutors say cost investors $294 million, according to a US court filing.】

item.title: 纳什维尔机场管理局计划发行 13 亿美元债券
item.description: 纳什维尔机场管理局计划在 1 月份出售 13 亿美元的债务，以满足前所未有的增长需求；这也预示着明年市场上将出现大额交易。【原文：Nashville’s airport authority plans to sell $1.3 billion of debt in January to meet unprecedented growth — an offering that also bodes well for the broader market to see large deals next year.】

item.title: First Brands 为何引发华尔街众多担忧？
item.description: 最近几周，华尔街因一家汽车零部件供应商的倒闭而受到震动，该公司因借贷和会计行为受到质疑而申请破产，负债超过 100 亿美元。First Brands Group 的倒闭使包括杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Wall Street has been shaken in recent weeks by the collapse of an auto-parts supplier that filed for bankruptcy with more than $10 billion in debt after questions arose about its borrowing and accounting practices. The unraveling of First Brands Group has ensnared major financial firms, including Jefferies Financial Group Inc., that had lending and other financial arrangements with the company.】

item.title: 黄金储备诉讼称 Rusoro 公司违反了 Citgo 竞标协议
item.description: Gold Reserve Ltd.起诉竞争对手 Rusoro Mining Ltd.，称其违反了加入竞购 Citgo Petroleum Corp. 控股股份的协议，该竞购是美国法院为偿还委内瑞拉政府所欠债务而拍卖该炼油企业的一部分。【原文：Gold Reserve Ltd. sued rival Rusoro Mining Ltd. for allegedly violating an agreement to join a bid to acquire the controlling shares of Citgo Petroleum Corp. as a part of a US court auction of the Venezuela-owned oil refiner to satisfy debts owed by the government.】

item.title: 美元一个月波幅上升，停摆结束在望
item.description: 在美国联邦政府可能重新开张之前，交易员们正急于对冲美元的波动，这将为包括关键劳工报告在内的一系列数据在停摆一个多月后的发布铺平道路。【原文：Traders are rushing to hedge against swings in the dollar ahead of a potential reopening of the US federal government that will pave the way for a slew of data, including key labor reports, to be released after a blackout of over a month.】

item.title: 甲骨文埃里森更换首席执行官后获得更多员工
item.description: 甲骨文公司联合创始人兼董事长拉里-埃里森（Larry Ellison）在 9 月份更换首席执行官后，增加了向他汇报工作的员工人数。【原文：Oracle Corp. co-founder and Chairman Larry Ellison added to the number of employees who report to him after the company changed chief executive officers in September.】

item.title: 距离制裁截止日还有数日，卢克石油资产运营竞赛白热化
item.description: 在美国财政部制裁俄罗斯能源巨头卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）并在上周否决了对该公司资产的重要收购之后，欧洲和中东各国政府正急于确保该公司庞大的石油业务能够继续运行。【原文：Governments across Europe and the Middle East are rushing to ensure the sprawling oil operations of Russian energy giant Lukoil PJSC can keep running after the US Treasury sanctioned the company and then quashed a key bid for its assets last week.】

item.title: Esentia 天然气网络希望通过全球发售募集 6.1 亿美元资金
item.description: Esentia Energy Development SA de CV 正在寻求筹集约 6.1 亿美元的资金，其中大部分资金将通过在墨西哥进行首次公开募股的方式筹集，因为这家中游天然气公司希望开发那些将业务迁往更靠近美国客户的公司的需求。【原文：Esentia Energy Development SA de CV is seeking to raise around $610 million, much of it through an initial public offering in Mexico, as the midstream gas company looks to tap demand from firms moving operations closer to US customers.】

item.title: 派克-汉尼汾正在洽谈收购过滤集团
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，派克-汉尼汾公司（Parker-Hannifin Corp.【原文：Parker-Hannifin Corp. is in talks to buy Filtration Group from Madison Industries, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通私人银行称金价有望在 2026 年底突破 5,000 美元
item.description: 摩根大通私人银行（J.P. Morgan Private Bank）表示，黄金的炙热涨势很可能在明年将价格推高至每盎司 5,000 美元大关以上，这主要是受到新兴市场经济体央行买盘的推动。【原文：Gold’s scorching rally is likely to take prices above the $5,000 an ounce mark next year, driven mainly by buying from central banks in emerging-market economies, according to J.P. Morgan Private Bank.】

item.title: Vantage 数据中心贷款最高限额为 3 亿美元
item.description: 据直接知情人士透露，加入零售银团发行 380 亿美元债务以帮助为 Vantage Data Centers 在得克萨斯州和威斯康星州与甲骨文公司有关的项目提供资金的贷款人至少需要承诺 3 亿美元，才有资格获得最高的费用。【原文：Lenders joining the retail syndication of the $38 billion debt offering to help fund Vantage Data Centers’s Oracle Corp.-linked projects in Texas and Wisconsin will need to commit at least $300 million to qualify for the highest fees, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 信贷为另类资产公司 2,570 亿美元的大部分收入提供了动力
item.description: 在第三季度，信贷策略为最大的上市另类资产管理公司带来了最多的资金，这凸显出尽管近期面临不利因素，但该资产类别的重要性仍在不断增加。【原文：Credit strategies drove the most fundraising for the biggest publicly traded alternative asset managers in the third quarter, underscoring the increasing importance of the asset class despite recent headwinds.】

item.title: 人工智能的咖啡花苞理论
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 惠誉称巴西企业的私人信贷和地方风险上升
item.description: 据惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）称，巴西企业面临的压力越来越大，因为它们对近年来迅速增长的私人信贷基金的风险敞口越来越大。【原文：Brazilian corporates face mounting pressure from their exposure to private credit funds that have grown rapidly in recent years, according to Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 流媒体平台 Rumble 通过北方数据交易押注人工智能
item.description: 如果你问 Rumble 公司的首席执行官，那么这家视频服务公司以 7.67 亿美元收购北方数据公司（Northern Data AG）将使其在人工智能领域与亚马逊公司和 Alphabet 公司等大科技公司并驾齐驱。【原文：If you ask Rumble Inc.’s chief executive officer, the video service’s $767 million acquisition of Northern Data AG will put it alongside Big Tech rivals like Amazon Inc. and Alphabet Inc. in the race to power artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 巴里克新领导层看好北美黄金业的未来
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp. ）的长期首席执行官马克-布里斯托（Mark Bristow）帮助公司建立了横跨多个大洲和多种商品的庞大矿山组合。现在，在布里斯托突然离职后，新的领导层认为未来主要在北美的金矿。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp.’s longtime chief executive Mark Bristow helped build a sprawling portfolio of mines that spanned multiple continents and commodities. Now, after Bristow’s abrupt departure, the new leadership sees a future mostly in North America’s gold deposits.】

item.title: 欧盟考虑禁止华为进入成员国移动网络
item.description: 据知情人士透露，欧盟委员会正在探讨如何迫使欧盟成员国逐步将华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：The European Commission is exploring ways to force European Union member states to phase out Huawei Technologies Co. and ZTE Corp. from their telecommunications networks, according to people with the matter.】

item.title: AQR 的克利夫-阿斯内斯认为股市昂贵但没有泡沫
item.description: AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）联合创始人克利夫-阿斯内斯（Cliff Asness）认为，美国股市似乎在历史上是昂贵的，尽管还没有达到泡沫的水平。【原文：The US stock market appears historically expensive, though not at levels that would suggest a bubble, according to Cliff Asness, co-founder at AQR Capital Management.】

item.title: 巴西电信公司 Oi 在历经十年挣扎后将进行清算
item.description: 陷入困境的巴西电信运营商 Oi SA 在经历了两次失败的法院重组程序后将被清算，这也是巴西历史上规模最大的重组程序之一。【原文：Troubled Brazilian telecom operator Oi SA will be liquidated following two failed court restructuring processes that ranked among the largest in Brazil’s history.】

item.title: ManTech 利用 BSL 市场为私人信贷债务再融资
item.description: IT 公司 ManTech International Corp. 周一启动了一项价值 23 亿美元的交易，部分用于私人债务再融资，为广泛的银团贷款市场赢得了胜利。【原文：IT firm ManTech International Corp. launched a $2.3 billion transaction on Monday, in part to refinance private debt, in a win for the broadly syndicated loan market.】
